title: Donald J Trump
body:
A guy who speaks bluntly but cares about America's future enough to risk his financial success, suffering constant public humiliation from the media for an entire year and ruining his personal brand. A guy who knows what it takes to win. 

He had everything to lose by running for president, but did it anyway because he truly wants to make america great again. 

Brings a tear to my eye just thinking about it.
